title: Front-end
description: Learn the technical and creative skills of User-Interfaces and User-Experience on web and mobile platforms

title: Back-end
description: Learn about the underlying systems that power the applications you interact with daily

title: Hardware
description: Get down to the wire and learn about microcontrollers, IoT devices like the raspberry pi, and be creative with computers that can affect the physical world

title: Data Science
description: Experience first-hand the power of what AI and statistical analysis can achieve, build off of existing models, and understand the fundamental concepts of machine learning

title: IT/Cybersecurity
description: Become versed in the realm of cloud computing, traditional and datacenter-level scalable hosting, and grasp the wonders of hacking and cybersecurity
